mapper.select: SELECT A.exercises_id, A.technology_id, A.learning_phase_id, A.knowledge_id, A.document_url, A.answer_url, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'P' THEN '待审阅' WHEN A.data_status = 'A' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '不可用' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, C.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_base.technology_knowledge_exercises A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin C ON A.update_user = C.admin_id WHERE technology_id = #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND learning_phase_id = #{arg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND knowledge_id = #{arg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.document_url LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.exercises_id, A.technology_id, A.learning_phase_id, A.knowledge_id, B.knowledge_name, A.document_url, A.answer_url FROM shangshufang_base.technology_knowledge_exercises A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology_knowledge B ON A.technology_id = B.technology_id AND A.learning_phase_id = B.learning_phase_id AND A.knowledge_id = B.knowledge_id WHERE A.technology_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.learning_phase_id = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.knowledge_id = #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.data_status = 'A' ORDER BY A.exercises_id;

SELECT B.exercises_id, B.technology_id, B.learning_phase_id, B.knowledge_id, B.document_url, B.answer_url FROM ( SELECT technology_id, learning_phase_id, knowledge_id FROM shangshufang_customer.course_plan WHERE university_code = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND school_id = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND course_id = #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND course_class = #{arg3,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology_knowledge_exercises B ON A.technology_id = B.technology_id AND A.learning_phase_id = B.learning_phase_id AND A.knowledge_id = B.knowledge_id AND B.data_status = 'A' WHERE B.knowledge_id = #{arg4,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY B.exercises_id;
